programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Qpid
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 194 The Enterprise is at Tegus 3, to host the Federation archaeologists council's annual symposium, where Picard is to give the key-note lecture on its enigmatic ruins, now forbidden to outsiders.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Drumhead
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 195 A retired admiral boards the Enterprise in an effort to determine the actions aboard the ship surrounding an act of sabotage and possible treason.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Half a Life
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 196 Counselor Troi's mother visits the Enterprise and becomes infatuated with a man whose culture forces him into a suicidal ritual called "The Resolution."

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Host
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 197 Dr. Crusher falls for someone who's not at all what she expects him to be.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Mind's Eye
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 198 Geordi is brainwashed by the Romulans to assassinate a Klingon ambassador.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - In Theory
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 199 When a female crew member is infatuated with Lieutenant Commander Data, he decides to give a romantic relationship a try. Also, the Enterprise finds itself having to maneuver through a dangerous nebula.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Redemption (Part 1)
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 200 Both Capt. Picard and Lt. Worf must decide where their priorities lie as the Klingon Empire descends into civil war.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Redemption (Part 2)
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 1 Picard risks all-out war with the Romulans when he involves Starfleet in a Klingon civil war.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Darmok
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 2 The crew is rendered helpless when Picard is kidnapped and forced to go to war with an alien captain.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Ensign Ro
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 3 Picard suspects a high-level Federation conspiracy when the crew is ordered to locate the terrorist leader of a renegade race.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Silicon Avatar
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 4 Picard struggles to communicate with a mysterious, destructive force before a visiting scientist can destroy it.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Disaster
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 5 The lives of the crew are in Troi's hands when a natural disaster forces her to take over as captain of the seriously damaged Enterprise.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Game
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 6 The fate of the Federation is in Wesley Crusher's hands when he returns to find the crew of the Enterprise addicted to a dangerous new game.

programme.title: Replicant - Replicant
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jean-Claude Van Damme squares off against his deadliest opponent yet -- himself -- when he stars as both a heinous serial killer and the replicated clone that scientists have constructed in order to kill him.

programme.title: Kill Switch - Kill Switch
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A pilot battles to save his family and the planet after an experiment for unlimited energy goes wrong.

programme.title: Encounter - Encounter
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A group of friends uncover an otherworldly object in a rural field, which they soon discover holds greater secrets than they could imagine.

programme.title: Day The World Ended - Day The World Ended
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 In a post-apocalyptic world after an atomic war, seven disparate people find themselves in a protected valley in the home of a survivalist and his beautiful daughter.

programme.title: Lifepod - Lifepod
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 In this futuristic retelling of Alfred Hitchcock's classic thriller "Lifeboat," nine passengers become trapped on an escape pod when their luxury space liner is destroyed by an unknown saboteur.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - One Minute to Midnight
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 22 Immortals and Watchers are poised at the brink of war. Every Watcher is hunting MacLeod, to bring him in dead or alive.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Prophecy
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 1 Immortal witch Cassandra comes to MacLeod to tell him of his role in an ancient prophecy.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - The End of Innocence
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 2 Richie's back and taking heads. One of those belonged to Carter Wellan, and Wellan's good friend Haresh Clay is out to avange his comrade.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Long Distance Call
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 22 A toy telephone becomes the link between a young boy and his dead grandmother.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - 100 Yards over the Rim
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 23 A pioneer from a wagon train in 1847 sets off to find something for his ill son and stumbles into present-day New Mexico.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Rip Van Winkle Caper
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 24 After successfully stealing a gold shipment, a group of criminals and their scientist accomplice put themselves in suspended animation in a remote desert cave. When they awaken decades later, complications ensue when their truck is destroyed.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Silence
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 25 Annoyed by a club member's constant chatter, a man bets him he cannot remain silent for a year, living in a glass enclosure in the club basement.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Shadow Play
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 26 Adam Grant is trapped in a recurring nightmare, in which he is sentenced to death and executed.

programme.title: Most Daring - Craziest Crimes Caught on Tape
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 9 Thugs attacking a wheelchair-bound man are shocked when he fights back; food thief; bank surveillance cameras record a smash-and-grab heist.

programme.title: Most Daring - Horror on the Highway 3
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 A car crashes into a fuel pump, turning a gas station into a deathtrap; bystanders race to save a family trapped in a burning car in the middle of highway traffic; two cars crash through a store's front doors.

programme.title: Court Cam - Top 10 Moments
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 A one-hour special featuring the best moments from season one of A&E's Court Cam.

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam - 203
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 2 A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: An emotional trial leads to an all-out brawl outside a Massachusetts courthouse; a defendant assaults his own attorney; the mother of a murder victim forgives her son's killer; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam - 207
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 6 A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: Fists fly when a quiet Michigan courtroom erupts into an all-out melee; a pro-pot defendant lights up right in front of a judge.

programme.title: Most Daring - Riots & Rumbles
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Two restaurant workers use their wrestling moves on an armed robber; a young surfer is beaten after wandering onto a locals-only beach; a family feud erupts at a wedding reception.

programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 A thrillseeker takes a tumble from his snowmobile in British Columbia, Canada; a man loses control of his superbike; two lions attack their keeper.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Hot Ride
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 1 A carjacking-turned-murder leaves a youth minister dead. Two men are caught and one suspect turns on the other. But, a last-minute change of heart changes everything.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Body Parts in My Pocket
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 74 A California serial killer shows up at a local sheriff's department with a victim's body part in his jacket pocket.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Menace to Society
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 75 A serial predator leaves a trail of bodies along the southeastern United States.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - The Burial He Wanted
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 76 The disappearance of a wealthy retiree in South Florida quickly turns from a missing person's case to a full blown homicide investigation.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - The Green Widow
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 77 The murder of a man inside his suburban Los Angeles home sets off a chain reaction of murder, conspiracy, and furious cover ups, which ultimately point back to a mastermind who's in it for the money.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Oh, Deer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 38 When her husband threatens her with divorce, an Arkansas hunter sets the scene for a tragic accident that's actually a murder.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Foul Plié
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 39 A ballet dancer is bludgeoned to death with her own point shoes, and investigators find a bookish body double waiting in the wings.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Shapeshifter
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 A young German grifter moves to America, adopts various identities and kills many people along the way.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Lasting Impressions
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 5 Criminals are betrayed by the clues their own bodies leave behind. A killer’s ear against a wall, a hand on a door, the path that he walks – even the slightest impressions left at the scene helps crime fighters find their man.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Murder Weapons
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 Weapons are the hallmark of violent crime, tools designed to harm or kill. Forensic science has developed a world of techniques for tracking and identifying these devices. Ballistics and trauma wounds tell crime scene investigators their deadly story.

programme.title: I Lived with a Killer - San Francisco Witch Killers
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 8 Michael Bear Carson and his wife, Suzan, leave a trail of death when they set out to kill witches.

programme.title: I Lived with a Killer - Lefty Gunns Ruggiero
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 Ramona Rizzo tries to set the record straight about her grandfather, "Lefty Guns" Ruggiero.

programme.title: Cops UK: The Bodycam Squad - Episode 7
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 Goer gets glassed by a woman.

programme.title: Cops UK: The Bodycam Squad - Episode 8
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 A drug bust takes two men by surprise, a drunk man loses control in the cage, and a knife amnesty leaves cops in shock.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Derrick Bird
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 13 In Cumbria, 2010 taxi driver Derek Bird took his gun and, in less than 24 hours, shot dead 12 people and injured 11 more. The callous killer only stopped when he had run out of ammunition, finally turning the gun on himself.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Danny Rolling
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 14 In 2010, Derek Bird took his gun and, in less than twenty-four hours, killed twelve people and injured eleven more. He stopped when he had run out of ammunition, finally turning the gun on himself.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Favor The Bold
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 5 While Kira prepares for the destruction of the Federation minefield, Sisko plans to retake Deep Space Nine.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Sacrifice Of Angels
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 6 When the minefield is soon to be demolished, Sisko leads a mission to take back Deep Space Nine.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - You Are Cordially Invited
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 7 Worf's plans for a traditional Klingon wedding are threatened when Martok's wife refuses to accept Dax into their family.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Resurrection
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 8 The alternate universe double of Kira's slain love requests asylum on Deep Space Nine.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Statistical Probabilities
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 9 Genetically engineered savants under Bashir's supervision predict doom for the Federation.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Magnificent Ferengi
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 10 Quark leads a Ferengi mission to rescue his mother from the Dominion.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Waltz
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 11 After their ship is destroyed, Sisko is stranded on a distant planet with an increasingly disturbed Dukat.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Who Mourns For Morn?
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 12 Quark inherits a fortune -and a group of thieves lay claims to the estate.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - One Little Ship
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 13 Hidden on a shrunken Runabout, Dax, O'Brien, and Bashir are Sisko's only hope when the Jem'Hadar overtake the Defiant.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Far Beyond The Stars
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 14 Sisko envisions he is a science-fiction writer encountering racism in 1953 America.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Honor Among Thieves
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 15 An undercover operation turns personal for O'Brien when he befriends his criminal contact.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Change Of Heart
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 16 When Dax is seriously injured during a crucial mission, Worf must question his priorities.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Wrongs Darker Than Death Or Night
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 17 Kira learns that her mother was once Gul Dukat's mistress.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 17 A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 24 A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 11 A boy's toy Batmobile car provides an important clue for detectives struggling to make a case against a serial killer who stalks and kills waitresses.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 In Missouri, a part-time missionary is convicted, 38 years later, of killing her 5-year-old stepdaughter, and the skeleton of a Michigan boy, dead for 10 years, leads police to a serial killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - The Merry Widow (#53)/The Missing Informant (#15)
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 In 1983, Navy seamen Sonny Grotton left base for a long weekend at home. But as he pulled into his driveway, a gunman killed him. And in 1993, former state trooper Doug Wright claimed his estranged wife shot and killed herself in their home.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 14 It takes nine years and the work of cutting-edge forensic toxicologists to solve the murder of a medical examiner's wife. Then, a determined Alabama sheriff reopens the case of the deaths of two babies, hoping to get their mother to confess.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files (#1)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Looks at how law enforcers stick with cases for many years, using fresh evidence to win convictions or to free prisoners who were wrongfully jailed. We examine the unsolved murder of Hogan's Heroes star Bob Crane.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 24 A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 25 A murderer's saliva, found on envelopes, helps seal his doom 37 years after his first killing. And Colorado police crack a cold case 24 years later when they take a DNA sample from the victim's son that proves that his father murdered his mother.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 A 13-year-old girl's mother is murdered and 20 years later she helps bring the killer to justice, and a dogged policeman gets to the bottom of the brutal murder of a 63-year-old newspaper delivery woman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 4 Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 22 The killing of a woman in a VA goes unsolved for a quarter of a century before investigators are finally able to zero in on the likely killer. And, in 1999 detectives test the blood evidence and develop a DNA profile of a shooting death from 1980.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 Investigators in Virginia, probing the murder case of a sailor, seek the help of a forensic anthropologist from the "body farm" in the Great Smoky Mountains. Dr. William Bass became an expert on the human body's rate of decay by watching bodies.
